ContainsNotFound

Indicates whether the result contains a "not found" message.

public bool ContainsNotFound { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

Message

Returns a formatted string with the first message (e.g., "Title - Detail"). Ignored in JSON serialization to prevent duplication.

[JsonIgnore(Condition = JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull)]
public string? Message { get; }

Property Value

string

MessageDetail

Returns the first message detail (usually the main one). Ignored during JSON serialization to avoid redundancy.

[JsonIgnore]
public MessageDetail? MessageDetail { get; }
